text: Gordon David Sondland (born July 16, 1957)https://www.parlament.gv.at/PAKT/EU/XXVI/EU/01/45/EU_14558/imfname_10793607.pdf is an American diplomat and businessman. He was the United States Ambassador to the European Union from 2018 to 2020. Sondland is also the founder and former chairman of Provenance Hotels and co-founder of the merchant bank Aspen Capital. In November 2019, Sondland testified as a witness at the Impeachment inquiry against Donald Trump. He was fired by Trump on February 7, 2020, two days after Trump's impeachment trial ended. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Ambassadors of the United States to the European Union Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Washington (state) Category:Politicians from Washington (state) Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Gordon Sondland
